bactromod.options.title: BactroMod Settings
bactromod.options.gammaMultiplier.desc: Boosts in-game brightness by set factor.
bactromod.options.nightVision.desc: Disables the night vision status effect.
bactromod.options.pumpkinBlur.desc: Disables black texture overlay that strongly limits view when player wears a carved pumpkin.
bactromod.options.fireOffset.desc: Moves fire texture in height. Usually you would select a negative value to move fire texture down and free up your view.
bactromod.options.shieldOffset.desc: Moves shield in height when in first-person perspective. Usually you would select a negative value to move shield down and free up your view.
bactromod.options.showMapWhileInBoat.des: Allows maps to always be shown when moving in boat.
bactromod.options.lavaFog.desc: Disables fog caused by diving into lava.
bactromod.options.powderSnowFog.desc: Disables fog caused by diving into powder snow.
bactromod.options.blindnessFog.desc: Disables fog caused by blindness effect.
bactromod.options.darknessFog.desc: Disables fog caused by darkness effect.
bactromod.options.waterFog.desc: Disables fog caused by diving into water.
bactromod.options.dimensionBossFog.desc: Disables dimension fog (e.g. in Nether) or fog caused by bosses.
bactromod.options.fixShieldRiptideTriden: Fixes the position of shield in offhand while using riptide trident in water or rain.
bactromod.options.darkWindowBorders.desc: Enables dark window border in Minecraft (only on Windows 11).
modmenu.summaryTranslation.bactromod: A lightweight mod with some game optimizations and features.
modmenu.descTranslation.bactromod: A lightweight mod with some game optimizations and features.
